actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tax Reform Act of 1976 to conform the termination date for certain tax deductions for transfers of partial interests in property for conservation purposes with the termination dates of related provisions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend for four years (to June 14, 1981) the deadline for tax deductible charitable contributions of certain partial interests in recreation lands and historic lands and buildings for conservation purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tax Reform Act of 1976 to conform the termination date for certain tax deductions for transfers of partial interests in property for conservation purposes with the termination dates of related provisions.
